#comment: Case 0. Period is one year (2024) because we are in 2025 now.
Case 1: Period is one year (2024) because we are in 2025 now.
Case 2: One period Nov. 2023 - July 2024 (243 days, 61 in non-leap year and 182 in leap year)
Case 2: Two periods: July 2024 - August 2024 (61 days) and Sept. 2024 going forward (up to end calculation)
Case 3: period_from_date is one day before summertime change, period_to_date is one day after wintertime change (213 days total).
Case 4: Two periods: Period 1 - 01.11.2023-01.31.2024 (92 non-leap days), Period 2 - 01.02.2023-30.06.2024 (151 leap days)
Case 4: One period: Period 3 - 01.07.2024-14.01.2025 (199 leap days)
Case 4: Two periods: Period 4 - 01.15.2024-01.31.2024 (16 leap days), Period 5 - 1.02.2024-... (up to end)
